name: Puzzling Problems Plus BETA
description:
Hey everyone! It is finally time and I am exited for the release of the beta of Puzzling Problems Plus! Now, the full game will be free and if you are wondering, yes this is gonna be the definitive version of Puzzling Problems. But I will keep up the original.

BUYER'S GUIDE -

Normal Beta Edition 0.1 - Just the game. | Price = Free

Special Beta Edition 0.1 - The game and a few bonuses including the ability to mod the game. (NOTE - MODDING NEEDS GAMEMAKER 8.1 OR ABOVE) | Price = Free (full release special edition will be paid)

Hope you all enjoy this game! And don't forget - #PlayPuzzlingProblems #PuzzlingProblemsPlus

Tips and tricks and more - https://rebateman.itch.io/puzzling-problems-plus/devlog/162598/welcome-to-the-beta-launching-the-game-and-tips-and-tricks
